Name: Damaged Claw
Description: It can be obtained during Monster Hunts and can be used to make clothing and accessories, as well as Battle Imagines. It is a Raw Material.
Description$english: It can be obtained during Monster Hunts and can be used to make clothing and accessories, as well as Battle Imagines. It is a Raw Material.
Description2$english: It seems... still retains good hardness, can be processed to greatly expand its uses.
